of objects working together. I use an example in my "Architecture

thout Trying" demo that shows MVC/MVP emerging without my pushing in

direction, but simply by paying attention to duplication and 
names. The en=
tire demo takes maybe 2 hours.

After they practice for a while, I offer to=
 spend an hour doing the 
same demo, but Presenter-First style, designing t=
he Model and View 
interfaces, usually using a dynamic mock framework. This=
 takes about 
an hour.

So I would definitely expect to take an entire day.=
 If you can

model,

press them.

d check

minutes, spend 10 minutes answering questions or sharing tips and

related to observations you made about their progress: common

hat kind of thing. Then give them a 10-minute break.

uch as needed.

om to be
